amendment.description: Amendment requires the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology to conduct a study on the development and implementation of health information technology in medically underserved communities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 109-603 to create a study that provides benchmarks for best practices and cost effectiveness for the use of Health Information Technology in medically underserved areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Towns amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 1 (Roll no. 414).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Towns.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Towns amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 1 (Roll no. 414).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
